fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Trade, Culture, Customs, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Youth, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Sport, Transport, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives: Horizon2020, ricerca ed innovazione, energia, trasporti, Europe on the Move
organisation_name: Tuscan Organisation of Universities and Research for Europe (TOUR4EU)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: TOUR4EU si occupa di favorire l'interazione tra i sette atenei della regione Toscana e le istituzioni europee al fine di supportare la ricerca in differenti ambiti : sanità, agricoltura, cambiamenti climatici, efficienza energetica, digitalizzazione.
